workable solutions and we hope that those in the ﬁeld of AI and ML will accept the
empirical ﬁndings and work to improve the forecasting accuracy of their methods.
— Statistical and Machine Learning forecasting methods: Concerns and ways forward , 2018.
10.9 Extensions
This section lists some ideas for extending the tutorial that you may wish to explore.
